header_text: You are talking with a group of coworkers about TV shows. When you say what you like about an old TV show that you just discovered, no one responds. They probably think that you are weird.

elements.Text: Do your coworkers judge you for what you said about the TV show?

elements.name: You are talking with a group of coworkers about TV shows. When you say what you like about an old TV show that you just discovered, no one responds. They probably think that you are weird._Mental Health_comp_question
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
